question: Alph River and Onyx River are located in which among the following continents?
explanation: Alph River is a small river of Antarctica. It is running into Walcott Bay, Victoria Land. It is in an ice-free region at the west of the Koettlitz Glacier, Scott Coast. The Onyx River is an Antarctic meltwater stream. It flows westward through the Wright Valley from Wright Lower Glacier and Lake Brownworth. At 32 kilometres (20 mi) in length, it is the longest river in Antarctica.
